projects.name: Happy Thoughts
projects.description: This project aims to develop a social media application where users can share thoughts and like others' posts. It utilises GET and POST API requests to refresh the user interface in response to user actions. Simultaneously, the system tracks the total counts of likes.

projects.name: Survey
projects.description: This weeks project was to create a survey form with at least 3 questions using React. We had to have accessability in mind and our pair aimed for a lighthouse score of 100.

projects.name: Music Releases
projects.description: This project entails building a responsive React web application that displays music album releases, mimicking a user experience similar to browsing on Spotify.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Creating a weather app by getting the information from WeatherAPI.
